definition: abbr. for Ukraine 烏克蘭|乌克兰[Wu1 ke4 lan2]/surname Wu
all/both/entirely/(used for emphasis) even/already/(not) at all

sentences.english: Not to forget, they will replacing Urdu with Mandarin.
sentences.chinese: 他們將用漢語取代烏爾都語。

sentences.english: I know many of my colleagues have keen interests in picking up Urdu language.
sentences.chinese: 我知道我的很多同事對學習烏爾都語懷有濃厚的興趣。

sentences.english: Urdu and English are both recognized as the official languages of Pakistan.
sentences.chinese: 烏爾都語和英語都被作爲巴基斯坦的官方語言。

sentences.english: Pache Figure ethnic groups and ethnic conflicts have continued in Urdu.
sentences.chinese: 帕什圖族羣與烏爾都語族羣矛盾一直不斷。
